Production Co: Summit Entertainment, Film Rites, Intrepid Pictures
Rating: PG-13 (Intense Sequences of Violence|Intense Sequences of Action|Language)
Synopsis: Young business consultant Will Shaw (Henry Cavill) flies to Spain for a vacation aboard his family's sailboat. When Will returns from some on-shore shopping, his family is gone and will be killed if he does not deliver a missing briefcase within 24 hours. As it turns out, his father (Bruce Willis) is not a cultural attache but a spy, and Will is in over his head. He must find a way to turn the tables on his enemies, or he and his family will all die.
Title: The Cold Light of Day
